name: artifactory-primary
description: As the first, and only, universal Artifact Repository Manager on the market, JFrog Artifactory fully supports software packages created by any language or technology.
preInstallNotes:
WARNING: Artifactory on DCOS is currently in ALPHA. There may be bugs, incomplete
features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.

If you didn't provide a value for `host-volume` in the CLI,
YOUR DATA WILL NOT BE SAVED IN ANY WAY.
postUninstallNotes: Artifactory has been uninstalled. Note that any data persisted to a NFS share still exists and will need to be manually removed.
